alert.note: Alert for Gordon; Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 2:07PM EST until February 06 at 2:12AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Conasauga River near Tilton affecting Whitfield, Gordon and Murray Counties. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Eton, Crandall, Dalton, Keiths Mill near Dalton, Chatsworth, Tilton, Sloan Bridge near Dalton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Conasauga River near Tilton. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pastures along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on the Brackett Ridge Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 16.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 19.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 18 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
